timeline.message: Remove javac.bootclasspath.1.7 from bnd files now that we use Java 8 to build

timeline.author: tevans78
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ Bundle-Version: ${bFullVersion}.${if;${driver;gradle};${version.qualifier};eclip
 -consumer-policy :    ${range;[==,+)}
 
 # Require a 1.6 JDK (at least): see section 3.4.1 of OSGi 4.3 core spec
-Require-Capability: osgi.ee;filter:="(&(osgi.ee=JavaSE)(version=1.7))"
+Require-Capability: osgi.ee;filter:="(&(osgi.ee=JavaSE)(version=1.8))"

timeline.author: tevans78
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,7 +32,7 @@ Bundle-Version: ${bFullVersion}.${if;${driver;gradle};${version.qualifier};eclip
 -consumer-policy :    ${range;[==,+)}
 
 # Require a 1.6 JDK (at least): see section 3.4.1 of OSGi 4.3 core spec
-Require-Capability: osgi.ee;filter:="(&(osgi.ee=JavaSE)(version=1.7))"
+Require-Capability: osgi.ee;filter:="(&(osgi.ee=JavaSE)(version=1.8))"

replies.bodyText: The comment is accurate in that Java 6 is the minimum required level.  If you don't want it left, I am included to remove it completely instead of updating it.
replies.author: jhanders34

timeline.author: tevans78
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,7 +16,6 @@ Bundle-SymbolicName: com.ibm.jbatch.container
 Bundle-Description:  Java Batch RI core runtime implementation
 
 # java batch is part of EE7 and therefore requires java 1.7

replies.bodyText: I have removed this comment and also updated all other bnd files that had that comment.
replies.author: jhanders34

timeline.author: tevans78
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,7 +16,6 @@ Bundle-SymbolicName: com.ibm.jbatch.jsl.model
 Bundle-Description:  Java Batch RI model
 
 # java batch is part of EE7 and therefore requires java 1.7

replies.bodyText: I have removed this comment and also updated all other bnd files that had that comment.
replies.author: jhanders34

timeline.message: Remove javac.bootclasspath.1.7 from bnd files now that we use Java 8 to build

build: Update defaults to be Java 8.

- Update Require-Capability to be Java 8.
- Update default javac target and source to be Java 8
Remove javac.bootclasspath.1.7 from bnd files now that we use Java 8 to build
eclipse: Update .classpath files of Java 7 components to be Java 8.
bnd: Update Java 7 components to remove javac.source, javac.target and Require-Capability settings
eclipse: Update eclipse settings (org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs) to 1.8 for old java 7 components.
bnd: Remove Java 8 settings from bnd files for Java 8 components since it is now the default.

java: Update checksum in test case for Java 8 byte code.

Now that classes are generated with Java 8 byte code the checksum for
the class is different.
Remove javac.bootclasspath.1.7 from bnd files now that we use Java 8 to build
Remove javac.bootclasspath.1.7 from bnd files now that we use Java 8 to build
